title: Bonus: Memory Like A Fish - March 2024
content:
This week’s bonus is ‘Memory Like a Fish’, where James challenges Dan, Anna and special guest John Lloyd to see who can remember the most facts from a previous episode.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
